title: Sales Performance Dashboard
description: Interactive Power BI dashboard analyzing sales trends, customer segments, and revenue forecasts across multiple regions.

title: Customer Churn Prediction
description: Machine learning model predicting customer churn with 92% accuracy using Python, scikit-learn, and advanced feature engineering.

title: E-commerce Analytics Platform
description: Comprehensive analytics solution tracking user behavior, conversion rates, and product performance using Google Analytics and Tableau.

title: Financial Forecasting Model
description: Time series analysis and forecasting model for quarterly revenue predictions with confidence intervals and scenario planning.

title: Healthcare Data Insights
description: Analysis of patient outcomes and treatment effectiveness using statistical methods and data visualization techniques.

title: Social Media Sentiment Analysis
description: NLP-based sentiment analysis of social media posts to gauge brand perception and customer satisfaction trends.
